summary: I need to share you very important details from season 8 teaser ...Please share everyone ....!!!!!!
title: I need to share you very important details from season 8 teaser ...Please share everyone ....!!!!!!
body:
This is what I was always talking about . Sansa who betryed to Ned stark and informed Cersei about his planns in season 1.  She told to Cersei that Ned  planned to escape from Kings Landing 

There is a very interesting detail. Nobody knows about that in North. neither Arya,Jon or …Probably Bran knows about that. Why nobody spoke about that during 7 season?
Do you remember what happened after Sansa’s action? Cersei’s people mudrered Northern people who acompaned to Ned Stark from Winterfell. There were 300  man…
There is very special detail. who Knows about Sansas betrayal action? there is only 3 character stil alive: Cersei,Tyrion and Varys.
Tyrion and Varys are #TeamDany. Cersei is their enemy. 
she wants to break Stark house. what is the best maner for that?Tell the Starks that Sansa betrayed their father and he became a prissioner because of Sansa. 
look at this scene where Cersei meet to Jon 

is Cersei teling about Sansa to Jon?
Look at this season 8 teaser. there is very special detail’s from Ned Stark’s execution. There is two scene from Ned Starks’s death.
look …just look 

Do you remember Arya’s words to Sansa in season 7? 

ARYA: We both wanted to be other people when we were younger. You wanted to be a Queen, to sit next to a handsome Prince on the Iron Throne. I wanted to be a knight: to pick up a sword, like Father, and go off to battle. Neither of us got to be the other person, did we? The world doesn’t just let girls decide what they’re going to be. But I can, now. With the Faces, I can choose… I can become someone else. Speak in their voice, live in their skin. I could even become you.

(She mentioned Ned there too. with Sansa)

scene from season 7 where Arya read Sansa’s letter. This is letter from Cersei after Sansa informed about Ned. Why the used this detail ? 

Arya to Sansa: I would have let them to kill me before I betrayed my family …I remember you standing on that platform with Joffry and Cersei when thet dragged father to the block. I remember pretty dress you were wearing ….(Arya mentioned her father Ned Stark again.and especially his death  )

and another scene from season 8 teaser 

Arya Stark looked her father’s death

look at return of the Bran Stark in Winterfell. His meeting with Sansa. No emotion with his face. 

different from Sansa Bran hugged to Arya and Smiled 

But what happened when Bran gave a knife to Arya? He looked at Sansa exactly in this scene . 

And finaly. HBO realised season 8 posters and there is only 3 Stark :Arya,Jon and Bran. The puck survive ,but Lone wolf die …

There is no Sansa poster from House Stark. she is a lone walf and it’s fact. 

Cersei tells Jon about Sansa’s  betrayal.

And you think that someone will hear her explenation in north? 
‘‘I was a child?’‘ There were killed 300 northern men for Sansa. Ned Stark became a prisioner for her stupidity. Can you imagined Jon and Arya reaction about that?

summary: @thauma-purrge​ finally got me into GoT and I just had to paint the badass of Tarth. I rarely paint ‘live’ characters so she was...
caption:
@thauma-purrge​ finally got me into GoT and I just had to paint the badass of Tarth. I rarely paint ‘live’ characters so she was a fun challenge for me and I think I made some strides. Prints!

Shop | Ko-fi | Commissions

summary: The Final Season Of Game Of Thrones Is Coming In April 2019
title: The Final Season Of Game Of Thrones Is Coming In April 2019
body:
The Final Season Of Game Of Thrones Is Coming In April 2019

HBO have finally given Game of Thrones fans the news we’ve all been waiting for. According to the network, the final season of Game of Thrones would premiere in April 2019.

The announcement was made in a new teaser from HBO, which you can watch below.

Even though the new trailer doesn’t show any new footage from the final season of…

View On WordPress

External image

HBO have finally given Game of Thrones fans the news we’ve all been waiting for. According to the network, the final season of Game of Thrones would premiere in April 2019.

The announcement was made in a new teaser from HBO, which you can watch below.

Even though the new trailer doesn’t show any new footage from the final season of…

blog.name: multi-fandom-fanfiction
blog.title: Fangirl alert
blog.description: (Ships and request are open) you can find all my stories on my mobile masterlist which you can find here https://multi-fandom-fanfiction.tumblr.com/post/172358936128/new-mobile-masterlist i am just a fangirl of tons of fandoms. I write on Wattpad as well so if you wanna see more of my work check out https://www.wattpad.com/user/alertIamafangirl I also have a A03 you could follow me on at https://archiveofourown.org/users/Multi_Fandom_Fanfiction/profile please heart reblog comment tell me what I can do better and follow also I rp so please message and we will discuss rp's and rules thanks (Ships and request are open)

summary: What is in my drafts at the moment
body:
What is in my drafts at the moment

Romeo and Juliet-

A World War 2 au Robb Stark x reader request. (Game of thrones)

Age doesn’t define us-

A brie Bella x younger reader request. (Wwe)

A necessity-

A petyr baelish x true born daughter of Robert baratheon and Cersei lannister queen reader semi request (Game of thrones)

Two broken souls-

A jughead jones x plus size reader fic (riverdale)

I never stopped loving you-

A Billy Hargrove x reader fic (stranger things)

Serpents stick together

A fp jones x young single mom fic (riverdale)

Love again

A Jim hopper x reader fic (stranger things)

My king-

A Joffrey Baratheon x twin sister reader fic (Game of thrones)

Twisted Desires-

A Dean Winchester x younger sister reader x Sam Winchester fic (supernatural)

Going against the gods

A Ivar the boneless x younger sister reader fic (vikings)

summary: Game of Thrones 8.Sezon Tarihi Belli Oldu!
title: Game of Thrones 8.Sezon Tarihi Belli Oldu!
body:
Notice: Undefined index: sbrssfeedcfg_description_extend_content_size in /home/magazinhaberleri.com/public_html/wp-content/plugins/sb-rss-feed-plus/SB-RSS_feed-plus.php on line 303
Game of Thrones final sezonu başlangıç tarihi, sızdırılan bir video ile resmen duyuruldu. Game of Thrones final sezonuyla bize veda edecek. Game of Thrones yeni ve son sezonu ne zaman başlıyor? Game Of Thrones’a Diriliş Ertuğrul’dan Transfer Dünya genelinde milyonlarca izlenmeye sahip ve özellikle 7.sezonu ile birlikte her bölümünde rekor kıran HBO’nun son yıllara damgasını vuran …

Game Of Thrones’a Diriliş Ertuğrul’dan Transfer Dünya genelinde milyonlarca izlenmeye sahip ve özellikle 7.sezonu ile birlikte her bölümünde rekor kıran HBO’nun son yıllara damgasını vuran …

The post Game of Thrones 8.Sezon Tarihi Belli Oldu! appeared first on Magazin Haberleri.



from WordPress https://www.magazinhaberleri.com/game-of-thrones-8-sezon-tarihi-belli-oldu/ https://www.magazinhaberleri.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/game-of-thrones-8.sezon-tarihi-aciklandi.jpg

summary: Game of Thrones season finale to premiere in April ’19
title: Game of Thrones season finale to premiere in April ’19
body:
Entertainment News :Putting an end to speculations, makers of fantasy drama ‘Game of Thrones’ have finally revealed the release date of season 8.

HBO announced on Tuesday that the season finale will premiere in the month of April next year.

Along with the announcement, a teaser trailer of the finale was released from the official twitter handle of the fantasy drama. A number of posters were also released with ‘#FORTHETHRONE’ embossed on each of the posters.

According to Entertainment Weekly, the move is in line HBO’s debut marketing effort for the…read more

          →News Source: BS / Business Standard←

summary: 'Game of Thrones': The eighth and final season already has a release date
title: 'Game of Thrones': The eighth and final season already has a release date
body:
‘Game of Thrones’: The eighth and final season already has a release date

After several months of waiting, many delays and a whole year without new episodes of his favorite series, the fans of ‘Game of Thrones’ can now breathe easy because the eighth and final season of the fiction has a release date. The first of the last six episodes of this final installment can be seen next April 2019 on HBO.

In an…

summary: Megvan a dátum a Trónok harca utolsó évadához
title: Megvan a dátum a Trónok harca utolsó évadához
body:
Megvan a dátum a Trónok harca utolsó évadához

A Mashable weboldal szerint 2019 áprilisában érkezhet George R.R. martin kultikus sorozatának utolsó évad, szám szerint a kilencedik.

Eddig sajnos nekünk is ki kell bírni a hosszú telet, de tavasszal már tovább izgulhatunk, hogy ki ülhet a Vastrónra, vagy ki lesz a Mások seregének tagja.

És még egy teaser videót is kaptunk hozzá.

summary: News | Game of Thrones - confermato il mese di uscita!
title: News | Game of Thrones - confermato il mese di uscita!
body:
News | Game of Thrones – confermato il mese di uscita!

Ebbene sì.

Ogni battaglia.
Ogni tradimento.
Ogni rischio.
Ogni scontro.
Ogni sacrificio.
Ogni morte.
Tutto…per il Trono.

La resa dei conti è davvero vicina, e l’inverno quest’anno arriverà in primavera:

Aprile 2019.

Questo è quanto ci è dato di sapere, e ciò che ci lascia avere HBO, con un trailer che di nuovo ha forse nulla, se non qualche frammento – il resto è tutto ciò che GOT è stato. Ogni…

View On WordPress
